author: glacambre
description: Turn your browser into a Neovim GUI.
name: Firenvim

scripts.build: webpack && web-ext build --source-dir target/firefox --artifacts-dir target/xpi --overwrite-dest -n firefox-latest.xpi && web-ext build --source-dir target/thunderbird --artifacts-dir target/xpi --overwrite-dest -n thunderbird-latest.xpi
scripts.tests: npm run test-firefox && npm run test-chrome
scripts.test-firefox: webpack --env=firefox-testing && nyc instrument --in-place target/firefox && web-ext build --source-dir target/firefox --artifacts-dir target/xpi --overwrite-dest && jest firefox
scripts.test-chrome: webpack --env=chrome-testing && nyc instrument --in-place target/chrome && jest chrome
